reviewText: I'm in agreement with everybody, why oh why isn't this film on DVD, the VHS copy I have is no good now, it is so odd that so many other stupid junk films are put to DVD yet good stories with intelligent acting are not...why is this so????Clint - Melbourne
Title: Reuben, Reuben

reviewText: I don't know how I discovered this movie but I'm glad I did.I just came back from seeing The Dark Knight Rises  where Tom Conti played a small but memorable part, and started me remembering this movie.Reuben Reuben became a part of my being for a very long time..
summary: Edith my dear one...here's a chapter for your filthy book!
Title: Reuben, Reuben

reviewerName: John Baranyai "Book Nerd And Ex High School G...
reviewText: Watching this movie calls for an immense "Suspension Of Disbelief" on the part of the viewer which I could not quite accomplish. This movie stars Tom Conti who plays a washed up alcoholic poet and yet for some obscure reason EVERY woman he meets wants to have sex with him!!! In reality a fine looking woman like Kelly McGillis would not even give this drunk the time of day but in this movie she falls for his charms whatever they may be.This drunk is so stupid that he is having sex with his dentist's wife and yet he goes to to the guy to have some dental work done!!! Is that a recipe for asking for pain or what?This is a very pitiful excuse for a movie which I feel may have influenced a whole Legion of young men out there to pick up the bottle in the sadly mistaken belief that when they are dunk they are irresistable to women. Sadly this happens every Saturday night at your local bar!!!
summary: I'm A Drunk BUT I Get To Have Sex With Lotsa Women!!!
Title: Reuben, Reuben

reviewText: This is a great, great movie.  Tom Conti is superb.  Kelly McGillis is perfectly cast too.  A gem of a story.  I don't understand why this classic is not available on DVD.
Title: Reuben, Reuben

reviewText: I am suprised that this movie has not made it's way to dvd. I used to own a vhs tape of this film (and a vhs player)with which I would watch this movie very much.This is a great story of a poet and the life that he leads. Great Film!
Title: Reuben, Reuben
